entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Goderich
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 6:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -11.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -12.8°C
Wind: WSW 56 km/h gust 74 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 100. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending overnight then a few flurries. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Blowing snow overnight. Local snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
